conclusion: Area = \( \frac{1}{2} \times t_1 \times a_B t_1 = \frac{1}{2} a_B t_1^2 \).

conclusion: Therefore, the velocity of object B at time \( t_1 \) is: \( v_B(t_1) = \frac{1}{2} a_B t_1^2 \).
